1. firstly, in a large bowl take 2 cup wheat flour, 1/4 tsp turmeric, ¾ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp cumin powder and ½ tsp garam masala.

 2. also add 1/2 tsp aamchur, 1/4 tsp ajwain, 1 tsp ginger paste, 1 cup spring onion and 1/2 tsp salt.

 3. mix well making sure all the spices are well combined.

 4. further, add 2 tbsp oil and mix well.

 5. now add water as required and knead the dough.

 6. knead to a smooth and soft dough adding water as required.

 7. cover and rest for 20 minutes.

 8. now pinch a small ball sized dough

. 9. dust with wheat flour and flatten slightly.

 10. grease oil in centre and fold to a square.

 11. dust with wheat flour as required and roll square.

 12. roll gently making sure the layers are not pressed completely.

 13. now on a hot tawa place the rolled paratha and cook for a minute.

 14. furthermore, when the base is partly cooked, flip the masala paratha.

 15. also, spread ½ tsp olive oil / ghee and press slightly both the sides.

 16. flip again once or twice till both the sides are cooked properly.

 17. finally, serve spring onion paratha with raita and pickle.
